Memo for manual extensions of continuous V fluid orders

Super, CONFIGURATION, ShowContinuousInExtendWindow = 0

Continuous orders have no fixed end point after documentation starts; users can continue to enter data indefinitely. For this reason, continuous orders are normally not included in the Extend Orders dialog box. This parameter allows you to include these orders in the dialog box so that users can validate their continuation. Extending such an order will add an automatic memo to the order.

Values

0 = Continuous IV fluid orders cannot be extended (they will not be listed in the Extend Order dialog box)

1 = Continuous IV fluid orders can be extended
